item.title: CV
item.description: PDF Education 2014.09 – 2018.06   Nanjing University, Nanjing, China B.Sc. in Computer Science and Technology (National Elite Program) 2020.09 – Current   École polytechnique fédérale de Lausanne Master in Data Sciences Research & working experiences 2022.02 – Current   DisneyResearch|Studios, Zürich, Switzerland 2021.03 – 2021.12   VILAB@EPFL, Lausanne, Switzerland Measuring the effectiveness of self-supervised pre-training methods for transfer learning. 2021.07 – 2021.09   Tencent PCG, Shanghai, China Research in transformer-based multi-label image classification.

item.title: Home
item.description: My Chinese name is 徐世坚. I received my B.Sc. degree in Computer Science and Technology in 2018 from Nanjing University (Elite Program). Currently, I am a Master student at EPFL.
